attributes.action: Ask the producers of Channel 4's "Hollyoaks" to change the credits back to the old version.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On 26 Feb the opening credits of Hollyoaks changed to a version so ear splittingly bad that squadrons of confused viewers thought they had tuned into some sort of Europop channel by mistake.

Even though the old version of the credits had dead characters in, we ask the Prime Minister to write to the producers of Hollyoaks to bring them back, or at least change the music.
